alert.note: Alert for Forest; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 8:58PM EST until November 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches, with the higher amounts in northern portion of the counties. * WHERE...Forest, Mercer, and Venango Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few snow squalls will also be possible Tuesday afternoon. This could cause a rapid deterioration in visibility, and hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
